title: Steriwave: Your Invisible Shield Against Pathogens
desc: With Steriwave, disinfection becomes second nature. This solution uses UV-C technology to eliminate up to 99.9% of bacteria, viruses, and fungi, ensuring uncompromised cleanliness. Whether in hospital rooms, waiting areas, or any other sensitive space, Steriwave provides unparalleled peace of mind.

title: Medilink: Simplify, Connect, Care
desc: Medilink revolutionizes medical data management by enabling seamless, secure communication between all healthcare actors. Imagine a platform where every test result is instantly available, every diagnosis facilitated, and every care decision accelerated. Medilink is your partner for optimal patient care.
